text:
@SteveBakerHW Why do you hate this country so much? What have we ever done to you?

Why would you inflict so much pain, damage & deprivation on us, on top of the tragedy of COVID19, in the name of *keeping a promise*, even as you broke the more important promise of getting a good deal with EU?
